title: Chemistry Internship
description: An internship program that provides work experience with public/private sector employers. Subject to the availability of positions, students will work in a local company under the supervision of a faculty member and site supervisor. P/NP grades only. May be taken for credit a maximum of three times. Prerequisites: completion of ninety units with a minimum GPA of 2.5, and an approved Special Studies online application, and AIP learning agreement.
